snippet.title: Arena completes $55m placement
snippet.content: Arena REIT has completed the $55 million fully-underwritten institutional placement, pricing at $2.03 per security. Arena is offering a non-underwritten SPP to eligible securityholders in Australia and New Zealand at the same price as the institutional placement. The total amount to be raised is $5 million, with the capacity to accept a further $5 million in oversubscriptions. Originally published as
